net.sourceforge.cruisecontrol.sampleproject.connectfour

Class PlayingStand

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sourceforge.cruisecontrol.sampleproject.connectfour.PlayingStand

  • public class PlayingStand
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the playing field (or stand) in the game of Connect Four. This class encapsulates all the game logic, including turn-based plays, winning, stalemating and illegal moves.
